info.description:
Inspired by Godot's work of art "My Little Fetish: Friendship is Kinky". I thought there deserved to exist a similar Equestria Girls story. The starting options are similar, but why change a format that isn't broken?

Rules are simple because I don't like writing long rules:

1) Keep content related to Equestria Girls.
2) Assume any pony character can be found here as a humanized version, whether as a teacher, student, faculty, parent, whatever.
3) No limits on content/kinks. The more kinds the better. As long as it gets someone off, it's fair game.
4) Make as many branches as you can; no chapters with only one option!
5) As few dead ends as possible. Don't dead end both options from a single chapter.
6) Keep a good amount of content in each chapter and at least pay attention to spelling and the like.
7) Love and tolerate (OOC-ly at least. No promises IC-ly.)
